com.braze.ui.inappmessage.views

Class InAppMessageImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatImageView
      • com.braze.ui.inappmessage.views.InAppMessageImageView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInAppMessageImageView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InAppMessageImageView

    public class InAppMessageImageView
extends AppCompatImageView
implements IInAppMessageImageView
    Extends ImageView with the ability to clip the view's corners by a defined radius on all image types.
